ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Load Issues Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Load Issues') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, RecordType.Name!='NS Internal',
OR(
ISBLANK(NS_CustomerContactNotifiedOfResolution__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c) , ISBLANK(NS_ShipperContactName__c) , ISBLANK(NS_ShipperContacted__c), ISPICKVAL( NS_AncillaryChargesProtected__c,'') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Ancillary Charges Protected, Customer Contact Notified, Date Customer Notified, Shipper Contact Name, and Shipper Contacted prior to closing the Case.
